column4: Tesla says robotaxis coming to U.S. roads next year  slams rivals' use of Lidar
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Chief Executive Elon Musk said Tesla Inc robotaxis with no human drivers would be available in some U.S. markets next year  continuing a habit of bold pronouncements that have excited many investors while often missing deadlines.

column4: UPDATE 7-Tesla says robotaxis coming to U.S. roads next year  slams rivals' use of Lidar
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  April 22 Chief Executive Elon Musk said Tesla Inc robotaxis with no human drivers would be available in some U.S. markets next year  continuing a habit of bold pronouncements that have excited many investors while often missing deadlines.

column4: Elon Musk on Tesla's self-driving capabilities
column5: Tesla Inc revealed its self-driving plans during an investor day on Monday  with Chief Executive Elon Musk predicting the launch of an autonomous robotaxi service next year in some U.S. markets.

column4: Tesla shows off self-driving technology to investors
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  April 22 Tesla Inc broadcast a web presentation on Monday to update investors about its self-driving strategy as Chief Executive Elon Musk tries to show that the electric car maker's massive investment in the sector will pay off.

column4: Model S fire video adds to Tesla woes pre-results
column5: SHANGHAI Video of a parked Tesla Inc  Model S exploding and a Wall Street downgrade of the electric carmaker's stock pushed shares down 4 percent on Monday  as it prepared to issue results for a troubled first quarter.

column4: UPDATE 5-Model S fire video adds to Tesla woes pre-results
column5: * Shares fall 4 percent (Recasts; adds analyst quotes  updates share price)
